categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Gno was a male who served as a senator within the Galactic Republic Senate during the Clone Wars. He remained in this role during the time of the Galactic Empire, aiding the Rebel Alliance after he was forced to resign. Reelected after the Battle of Endor to the Senate of the New Republic, Gno was a good friend of Leia Organa Solo, who had served in the Imperial Senate alongside him for a time.
